name: Dark MusicBee Forum
description:
An up-to-date dark theme for the MusicBee Forum that resizes to your screen resolution. You can choose your text and link color of choice! I might add more customizable settings later. Let me know if you have any issues.

I also make music! Check it out: https://soundcloud.com/guitarjorge24

Based on the theme "MusicBee - Dark Dark".
additional_info:
v0.9.1 (2016-03-24): Skinned the forum search results, re-enabled customizable text/link color
v0.9.0 (2016-01-25): Updated the Personal Messages page
v0.8.2 (2015-09-14): Skinned the footer at the bottom of the page
v0.8.1 (2015-09-14): Added customizable link color
v0.8.0 (2015-09-14): First release, fixes issues from the theme "MusicBee - Dark Dark".
